trans-unit.source: Represents a control that displays hierarchical data in a tree structure that has items that can expand and collapse.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en kontroll som viser hierarkisk data i en trestruktur med elementer som kan vise og skjule.

trans-unit.source: TreeView is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: TreeView er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, som betyr at den kan inneholde en samling objekter av en annen type (for eksempel streng, image eller panelet).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a simple TreeView.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser en enkel TreeView.

trans-unit.source: ![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration") The contents of a TreeView are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> controls that can contain rich content, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> controls.
trans-unit.target: ![TreeView illustrasjonen](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustrasjonen") innholdet av typen TreeView er <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>Kontroller som kan inneholde detaljert innhold, slik som <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> can contain one or more <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> objects as its descendants.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>kan inneholde én eller flere <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>objekter som etterfølgerne.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.source: A TreeView is defined as a hierarchy of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Typen TreeView er definert som et hierarki med <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>

trans-unit.source: A TreeView can populate its tree by binding to a data source and using <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> objects.
trans-unit.target: Typen TreeView fylle ut tre ved binding til en datakilde og bruke <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Examples of data sources include <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> and <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> objects.
trans-unit.target: Eksempler på datakilder <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>og <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>objekter.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>

trans-unit.source: Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues.
trans-unit.target: Visning av et stort antall elementer, kan det føre til ytelsesproblemer.

trans-unit.source: See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [optimalisere ytelsen: Kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: To improve the performance of a TreeView, see [How to: Improve the Performance of a TreeView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil forbedre ytelsen til typen TreeView, kan du se [slik: forbedre ytelsen til typen TreeView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about the TreeView control, see the [TreeView Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om TreeView-kontrollen, kan du se den [TreeView oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A TreeView has a limited number of levels.
trans-unit.target: Typen TreeView har et begrenset antall nivåer.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the TreeView Control To apply the same property settings to multiple TreeView controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasse TreeView kontrollen til i gjelder samme egenskapsinnstillingene flere TreeView kontroller, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>Gi kontrollen unikt utseende.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the TreeView, see [TreeView Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se delene og statusene som er spesifikke for TreeView, kan du se [TreeView stiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet egenskapene for denne kontrollen, kan angis ved kontrollens standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap er satt av en standardstilen, kan endre egenskapen standardverdi når kontrollen vises i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen er avhengig av hvilken stasjonær tema brukes når programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [standard WPF oppsett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in TreeView control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Angi en visual egenskap trenger bare en effekt hvis egenskapen er begge finnes i TreeView kontrollens standardmalen og angis ved hjelp av en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner en liste over visual egenskaper i delen "Endring i Visual strukturen av et kontroll" [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Expands the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> control and all its child <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: Utvider angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> kontrollen og alle underordnede <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> elementer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> to expand.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> skal utvides.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> and all its child elements were expanded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> og alle underordnede objekter er utvidet; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> to use to display content.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> skal brukes til å vise innhold.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"></xref> to use as a container for content.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem"> </xref> som brukes som en beholder for innhold.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> can scroll.
trans-unit.target: Henter om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref> kan rulle.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> because the control has a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> in its style.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> fordi kontrollen har en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> i malen.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified item is its own container or can be its own container.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om det angitte elementet er et eget beholder eller kan være en egen beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal evalueres.

trans-unit.source: if item is a ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if item is a ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Defines an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Dataene for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for an <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"></xref> event when the keyboard focus changes for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir klassen behandling en <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"> </xref> -hendelse når fokus på tastaturet endres for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"></xref> event that occurs when there is a change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Gir klassen behandling en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"> </xref> hendelsen oppstår når det er en endring i det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir klassen behandling den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation sets <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true` if one of the following keys is pressed together with the CTRL key: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen angir <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>til `true` Hvis én av følgende nøkler er trykt sammen med CTRL-tasten:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key></xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged"> </xref> hendelsen når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>verdien egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>

trans-unit.source: The event data that the parameter `e` provides contains an <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdataene som parameteren `e` gir inneholder et <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to the item that was previously selected, or is set to `null` if there is no previously selected item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til elementet som ble valgt tidligere, eller er satt til `null` Hvis det finnes ingen tidligere valgte elementer.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to the newly selected item, or is set to `null` if no new item is selected.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte i <xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til nylig merkede elementet, eller er satt til `null` Hvis ingen nye elementer er valgt.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Provides the item that was previously selected and the item that is currently selected for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir elementet som ble valgt tidligere og elementet som er angitt for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter det valgte elementet en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedItem property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control is a read-only property and is set to an item when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> property value of the item <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedItem den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>kontrollen er en skrivebeskyttet egenskap og settes til et element når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A>egenskapsverdi for elementet <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem.IsSelected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The selected object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Det merkede objektet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref>, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen elementer er valgt.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*> changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>endringer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier Field|| |Routing Strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: ## Rutet hendelsesinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Rutingstrategi | Bobling | | Representanten | | ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItemChanged"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the property that is the specified by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath*> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien til egenskapen som er angitt av <> </> *> for den <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the SelectedValue property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A>egenskapen angir banen til egenskapen som brukes til å bestemme verdien for egenskapen SelectedValue.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, assume that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EnployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Anta som for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>er bundet til en samling av objekter av typen `Employee`, som har to egenskaper kalles `EmployeeName` og `EnployeeNumber`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> and set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have SelectedValue return the value of `EmployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>å vise verdien for `EmployeeName` i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A>til `"EmployeeNumber"` har SelectedValue returverdi av `EmployeeNumber`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedValue property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedValue er en skrivebeskyttet egenskap.

trans-unit.source: To change the value of a selected item in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Endre verdien for et merket element i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>kan du bruke <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A>til å få tilgang til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The value of the property that is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValuePath*> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen som er angitt av den <> </> *> for den <> </> *>, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen elementer er valgt.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path that is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue*> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedItem*> in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir banen som brukes til å hente den <> </> *> av den <> </> *> i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedValuePath property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedValuePath angir banen til egenskapen som brukes til å bestemme verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, assume that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EnployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Anta som for eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>er bundet til en samling av objekter av typen `Employee`, som har to egenskaper kalles `EmployeeName` og `EnployeeNumber`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate> to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> and set SelectedValuePath to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> return the value of `EmployeeNumber`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en <xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>å vise verdien for `EmployeeName` i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>og SelectedValuePath `"EmployeeNumber"` har <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A>returverdi av `EmployeeNumber`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.HierarchicalDataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path that is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue*>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder banen som brukes til å hente <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView.SelectedValue*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""> </xref>.
